New Records: The Cavaliers improved to a franchise-record 9-0 with a 131-122 victory over the Pelicans.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers held off the hosts and won the game despite the Pelicans having three 20-point scorers.
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans will travel to Orlando this morning, then practice in Central Florida later today before visiting the Magic at 6 p.m. Friday.
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans couldn't get over the hump against unbeaten Cleveland, despite Zion Williamson scoring 29 points and Jose Alvarado scoring 27 points with 7/7 three-point shooting.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Check out action photos from Cavs-Pels.
Others: The Pelicans Podcast will feature a radio roundtable with analyst John DeShazier and sideline reporter Erin Summers on Friday.
